name: Marcel
description:
[EN] "Marcel" is a visual novel about a pre-teen duck stuck on a retirement island for a whole week during summer break. His dad, Oliver, asks him to help with the management of the place. You'll have to run some errands, deliver the mail to the residents and get to know your neighbors. 

This game was made by a small team in 10 days for "My First Game Jam".
All the visual assets are hand-drawn. The music was especially composed for the game.

Gameplay mechanics:

  • Make your own choices
  • Two different endings

Enjoy!
